author: gawor
msg: removing jaxws-war-sec for now as it got totally messed up

author: snoopdave
msg: Layout of the mediafile list is bad if the file name is so long that it wraps around, tried it out Firefox 3.5 and Safari 4.0. This commit adds a <str:truncateNicely> tag around the name to limit it's length and prevent the layout problem.

author: ggregory
msg: Renamed RequiredCharsetNames to CharEncoding to match [lang]. Constant name and values are the same.
